system.description: Wizard only. Cast in one of two ways. (1) Prepare: You prepare up to three additional spell levels of spells (e.g. one 3rd-level spell, or one 2nd and one 1st). These spells are in addition to your normal daily allotment. (2) Retain: You retain one spell you just cast in mind; you can cast it again within the next 24 hours without preparing it again.

components.materialDescription: A piece of string, a bit of root, and a small amount of dung. Focus: an ivory plaque of at least 50 gp value.
